messages.content: I finally moved into my new place in Williamsburg.
Congrats! How's the neighborhood?
It's great! My neighbor Mike helped me move, super nice guy.
That's awesome to have a helpful neighbor!
He even fixed my bike yesterday, I owe him $50 for parts.
Wow, that’s really generous of him!
I start my mornings with coffee at Devoción on Grand Street.
Sounds like a nice way to start the day!
And I usually hit the hardware store 2 blocks away on Bedford Ave when I need supplies.
That's convenient!
On Sundays, I love going to the farmers market at McCarren Park.
That sounds like a fun weekend activity!
I recently started exploring more of Williamsburg.
Nice! What have you discovered?
There's a great cafe called Devoción where I get my morning coffee.
Sounds delicious! Do you go there often?
Almost every day! I also have a neighbor, Mike, who helped me out a lot.
That's great! What did he help you with?
He fixed my bike last weekend, I owe him $50 for the parts.
It’s nice to have friends nearby who can help.
When I need tools, I just go to the hardware store 2 blocks away on Bedford Ave.
Perfect! That must save you a lot of time.
I also enjoy the farmers market at McCarren Park every Sunday.
What do you usually look for there?

queries.question: Where do you go when you need tools?

reference_answer.text: I go to the hardware store 2 blocks away on Bedford Ave.
